Our Tours and Treks

Join us for eco treks and nature tours in northern Thailand. We'll pick you up from your hotel or residence in Chiang Mai and take you on an adventure in the great outdoors. Choose from our signature one or two-day treks or add some sightseeing to your experience. We offer challenging treks for the super-active, as well as gentler treks for families.

Choose Your Next Adventure

Trekking Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails

Trekking and Sightseeing

Trekking and Family-Friendly Fun

Trekking with Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails

Join us on a signature Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails trek. We explore off the beaten path and show you the heart of the rainforest, visiting hidden waterfalls and remote hilltribe villages along the way. Hike to the top of northern Thailand's scenic hills with us and see spectacular views of this beautiful country. We carve our own paths, so treks can be adjusted to challenge active adventurers or suit groups with mixed fitness levels.

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 1 Day Chiang Dao

Experience a completely off the beaten track hiking trail in some of Chiang Mai, Northern Thailand's most beautiful National Parks. Pha Daeng National Park in Chiang Dao. Rich in fauna and flora. Incredibly scenic and non touristic. Here you will hike one of a kind special hiking trails. Hiking 4 - 5 hours through the heart of the rain forests. Visit waterfalls, view points and on the 2 day trails we will take you to sleep in a hilltribe village in the Mountains of Pha Daeng National Park..

Starting at THB 1,900 per person

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 2 Day Chiang Dao

Experience a completely off the beaten track hiking trail in some of Chiang Mai, Northern Thailand's most beautiful National Parks. Pha Daeng National Park in Chiang Dao. Rich in fauna and flora. Incredibly scenic and non touristic. Here you will hike one of a kind special hiking trails. Hiking 4 - 5 hours through the heart of the rain forests. Visit waterfalls, view points and on the 2 day trails we will take you to sleep in a hilltribe village in the Mountains of Pha Daeng National Park..

Starting at THB 2,800 per person

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 1 Day Doi Inthanon

Experience a completely off the beaten track hiking trail in Doi Inthanon National Park, rich in fauna and flora. Incredibly scenic and non touristic. Here you will hike one of a kind special hiking trails. Hiking 4 - 5 hours through the heart of the rain forests. Visit waterfalls, view points and even have the chance to see Gibbons in the Doi Inthanon National Park. and learn about the traditional herbal medicine used for centuries in home made saunas by the Karen Hilltribe.

Starting at THB 1,900 per person

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 2 Day Doi Inthanon

Experience a completely off the beaten track hiking trail in Doi Inthanon National Park, rich in fauna and flora. Incredibly scenic and non touristic. Here you will hike one of a kind special hiking trails. Hiking approximately 6 hours through the heart of the rain forests. Visit waterfalls, view points and even have the chance to see Gibbons in the Doi Inthanon National Park. and learn about the traditional herbal medicine used for centuries in home made saunas by the Karen Hilltribe. Our 2 day trails will take you to sleep in the Churkee Farm stay on the rice fields of a Karen Hilltribe Village in Doi Inthanon National Park. A farm stay that Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails, has helped build and do skills development in homestay building and management.

Starting at THB 2,800 per person

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 1 Day Doi Luang

Hike to the Summit of the 3rd Highest Mountain in Thailand, Doi Luang Mountain in Chiang Dao.

Starting at THB 1,900 per person

Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 2 Day Doi Luang

Hike to the Summit of the 3rd Highest Mountain in Thailand, Doi Luang Mountain in Chiang Dao. Sleep in a homestay under the star and visit a huge beautiful cave and go caving for 3 to 4 hours.

Starting at THB 5,200 per person

Trekking and Sightseeing

Discover some of the best hidden gems and spectacular sights in northern Thailand's National Parks. Combine eco trekking and sightseeing to make the most of your day with us. We'll arrange all the transportation and conveniences and you can rest easy knowing you're in for a unique outdoor experience.

1 Day Chiang Dao Cave, Hilltribes, and Sticky Waterfall

Visit Chiang Dao Cave, 5 Hilltribe villages and Bua Tong Waterfalls also known as sticky waterfall, which is a beautiful limestone waterfall made by an underground spring flowing down the rocks. The lime makes the rocks sticky which makes it possible to climb up the waterfall. The waterfall is found in the Sri Lanna National Park.

Starting at THB 1,800 per person

1 Day Doi Inthanon National Park and Nature Trail

This tour is a combination of a short 2 hour trek along a nature trail and the sightseeing tour. The 2 hour nature trail takes you through one of the most beautiful forests in Thailand offering you scenic views along an easy trail and you see some impressive waterfalls in the forest such as Wachirathan Waterfall. You can also try the renowned organic coffee by the local Karen Hilltribe as well. Visiting the highest spot in Thailand (the summit of Doi Inthanon) and the 2 Pagodas of the King & the Queen.

Starting at THB 1,600 per person

Trekking and Family-Friendly Fun

While a once in a lifetime outdoor adventure for anybody, these treks also happen to be perfect for families or groups with mixed fitness levels. Combine eco-trekking with soft-adventure activities like bamboo river rafting and see some of northern Thailand's most spectacular sights.

2 Day Hui Nam Dang Hilltribe Trail and Bamboo Rafting

Join us to the beautiful Hui Nam Dang National Park and hike scenic trails through the rainforest and jungles of the North. Passing through and sleeping in rural hilltribe villages and experiencing a rural way of life. Along the trail you will get to see buffalo and bamboo raft down the Mae Tang river. This trail is perfect for families with young and older children.

Starting at THB 3,500 per person

1 Day Chiang Dao Soft Adventure

Join us on an easy and beautiful nature trail through the Chiang Dao national park, enjoy the Rainforest and jungles fauna and flora, starting at Chiang Dao Cave, where we will explore the cave and temple grounds. Take a short drive to where we will start our short trek from a Karen Hilltribe village and walking to the Hot Springs where we can soak up the natural minerals in the water and have lunch. After that we will head to the beautiful Sticky Waterfalls, a natural limestone waterfall caused by the build up of minerals on the rock from the underground spring flowing down the rocks making them sticky and easy to climb.

Starting at THB 2,000 per person

Practicing sustainable tourism and supporting family run businesses
